name: Ennovasys
tag_list: rfid, gps, mobile, enterprise-mobility, android, nfc, wireless, supply-chain, logistics-tracking
overview:
Ennovasys is an Enterprise Mobility Solution provider.

Ennovasys is an Enterprise Mobility company helping its customers acquire real-time intelligence using wireless technologies like RFID, GPS, Mobile and NFC. Ennovasys is one of top few companies globally to offer RFID-GPS integrated solutions. Real-time intelligence facilitates enterprises to achieve process automation, reduce cost, improve utilization and increase overall productivity. Ennovasys enterprise solutions are cloud-enabled for quicker implementation and better cost-efficiency.
